      • isWinner

        public static java.lang.String isWinner(int p1,
                                        int p2,
                                        int p3,
                                        int p4)
        This method is used to compare each player's score to identify the winner, if two or above players share the same maximum score, then there should be no winner
        Parameters:
        p1 - player 1 score
        p2 - player 2 score
        p3 - player 3 score
        p4 - player 4 score
        Returns:
        the winner
